description:
In this course I am outlining to you the importance of having a market niche to focus on, rather than marketing your small business, services and/or products to the masses.

If you are in the process of building your business and you wonder how you can find more customers interested in your services or products AND who are able to pay our fees, then this course will give you a head-start over your competition.

It really doesn't matter what kind of service or product you offer, unless you target the right buyers, you will struggle to make a living. This course is set out in easy steps that you learn and you will be able to put into practice with little effort.

In addition and as a bonus I have also included the audio files of this course for you to download and listen to on your mp3 player.
title: Niche Marketing made easy
